class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        l=len(nums)
        dif=defaultdict(int)
        lst=[]
        for i in range(l//2):
            if nums[i]<nums[l-1-i]:
                nums[i], nums[l-1-i] = nums[l-1-i], nums[i]
            lst.append(max(k-nums[l-1-i], nums[i]))
            dif[nums[i]-nums[l-1-i]]+=1
            # print(nums[i], nums[l-1-i])
        ans=inf
        dif=list(dif.items())
        dif.sort(key=lambda x:x[1])
        lst.sort()
        print(dif)
        print(lst)
        for d, ct in dif:
            tmp=bisect.bisect_left(lst, d)
            print(d, ct, tmp)
            ans=min(ans, l//2-ct+tmp)
        return ans
